def hotel():
    
    t = int(raw_input())
    
    while (t>0):
        t-=1
        n = int(raw_input())
        arrivalList = map(int, raw_input().split())
        departureList = map(int, raw_input().split())
        
        listOfLists = []
        commonList = []
        for i in xrange(len(arrivalList)):
            listOfLists.append(range(arrivalList[i],departureList[i]))
        
        for i in listOfLists:
            commonList.extend(i)
        
        #print commonList
        
        commonList.sort()
        
        #print commonList
        
        maxCount = 1
        count = 1
        
        for i in xrange(len(commonList)-1):
            if commonList[i] == commonList[i+1]:
                count += 1
                if count > maxCount:
                    maxCount = count
            else:
                count = 1
        
        print maxCount
        #print listOfLists
    
    pass

hotel()
